item.title: introduce wifi direct between PC and Android under sshfs
item.description: Table of Contents structure speed test between phone and PC sshfs brutual shutdown cause other problems behavior difference between wifi and usb tramp on termux:hotfix: Usually I write memo in files in the storage under my Android phone. Previously I use usb-tethering between Android phone and PC connection. structure mount sshfs + wifi direct speed test between phone and PC wifi direct

item.title: design pattern of pthread
item.description: worker - watcher model normal case how watcher detects worker finishes late case how to kill the thread from watcher to worker

item.title: How to authorize my Baby to public Service in Germany
item.description: For instance, it requires your Baby’s identificatin number of German citizen and Residence Permission to access following service Kindergeld Elterngeld KITA Guteschein Following shows actual flow from birth event to finish all conditinos. It seems to take 3 months at least, if your original country is Japan. And bottle-neck is creating “Family Registration” record in Japan. That sounds a little bit funny. Questions are Do we need official translator of Geburtsurkunde for Birth Certificate?

item.title: How to prepare Parent's birth proof (Familienbuch)
item.description: Table of Contents When Your family in your original country can help When You do by yourself When Your family in your original country can help When You do by yourself

item.title: Initial test
item.description: [2018-03-11 Sun] Today is 7-year-anniversary for Fukushima Earthquake. Berlin weather radically changes today, now 16 cel degree. It’s crazy because it was -10 cel degree. Try to start using https://github.com/fniessen/org-html-themes.

item.title: Job title shows mindset, not position
item.description: [2018-03-14 Wed] Just for note. Job title is of course a position in the company, but one colleague tells a junior in his team that since companies have various structure, same name positions have various roles. So It is mind-set that is made common among the company by title.
